text: Morarji Ranchhodji Desai (29 February 1896 â€“ 10 April 1995) was an Indian activist and politician. Between 1977 and 1979, he was the 4th Prime Minister of India. ==References== Category:1896 births Category:1995 deaths Category:Prime Ministers of India Category:Indian Deputy Prime Ministers Category:Politicians from Mumbai
